en: But for his advice, I could not finish it.
But for your help, he would have failed.
If it had not been for your help, my father would have failed.
If it had not been for your help, I couldn't have completed the work.
If it were not for your help, I could not succeed.
With your help, I could succeed.
If she knew your address, she would write to you.
If it were not for your help, I could not run this store.
To look at him, you'd take him for a girl.
You must work hard if you are to succeed.
If you are to realize your dream, you must work harder.
If you want to be on time, you should be there by 11 o'clock.
tr: Vaktinde olmak istiyorsan, saat 11'e kadar orada olmalısın.

en: If you are to succeed in the exam, you must study hard.
tr: Sınavda başarılı olmak istiyorsan, çok çalışmalısın.

en: If you had helped me, I could have accomplished the work.
I don't want to go if you don't go with me.
If you will help us, we will be very glad.
If you are a member of a primitive community and you wish to produce, say, food, there are two things that you must do.
tr: İlkel bir topluluğun üyesiysen ve diyelim ki yiyecek üretmek istiyorsan, yapman gereken iki şey var.

en: If you hurry, you will soon overtake her.
tr: Acele edersen, ona kısa sürede yetişirsin.

en: You're playing with fire if you insist on riding your motorcycle without a helmet on.
tr: Motosikletini kasksız sürmekte ısrar edersen, ateşle oynuyorsun demektir.

en: Were you to know the fact you would be surprised.
Had you run all the way, you'd have got there in time.
tr: Tüm yolu koşsaydın, zamanında oraya varırdın.

en: If you had parked your car here, you would have been fined.
tr: Arabayı buraya park etseydin, ceza yerdin.

en: If only you were here, I could consult you about it.
tr: Keşke burada olsaydın, bu konuda sana danışabilirdim.

en: If you had missed that bus, you might not be here now.
tr: O otobüsü kaçırsaydın, şimdi burada olmayabilirdin.

en: Suppose you had ten million yen, what would you do?
tr: On milyon yenin olsaydı, ne yapardın?

en: If it were not for air and water, nothing could live.
tr: Hava ve su olmasaydı, hiçbir şey yaşayamazdı.

en: If it were not for air and water, nothing alive would exist.
tr: Hava ve su olmasaydı, hiçbir canlı var olamazdı.

en: If it were not for the air, planes could not fly.
They would have gotten a better exchange rate if they had gone to a bank.
tr: Bankaya gitselerdi, daha iyi bir döviz kuru alırlardı.

en: If I got rich, I would buy it.
If I had money, I could buy it.
Thousands of lives will be at stake if emergency food does not arrive there within a few days.
tr: Acil gıda yardımı birkaç gün içinde oraya ulaşmazsa, binlerce hayat tehlikede olacak.

en: If there's anything urgent, you can get in touch with me.
tr: Acil bir şey olursa, bana ulaşabilirsin.

en: If you hurry, you will catch up with him.
If you hurry, you will overtake him.
Let me know in case you feel sick.
tr: Kendini kötü hissedersen, bana haber ver.

en: If she's not careful she'll tear a ligament doing that.
tr: Dikkatli olmazsa, bunu yaparken bağlarını koparır.

en: Should you change your mind, let me know.
You may go home if you want to.
There will be hell to pay if I don't make this deadline.
tr: Bu teslim tarihine yetişemezsem, kıyamet kopar.

en: Correct me if I am wrong.
He seems to be afraid of being laughed at if he makes a mistake.
tr: Hata yaparsa, gülünmekten korkuyor gibi görünüyor.

en: If the patient is unconscious, the family can make the decision.
tr: Hasta bilinci kapalıysa, aile karar verebilir.

en: What will become of our offspring if a nuclear war breaks out?
tr: Nükleer bir savaş çıkarsa, çocuklarımıza ne olur?

en: But for everybody's support, I would not have passed the examination.
If the vase is not found, John may be accused of stealing it.
tr: Vazo bulunmazsa, John onu çalmakla suçlanabilir.

en: If a fire should break out, I would make off with my flute.
If I had time, I would study French.
If anything goes wrong, I'll answer for the consequences.
tr: Bir aksilik olursa, sonuçlarına ben katlanırım.

en: In case anything happens, call me immediately.
tr: Bir şey olursa, beni hemen ara.

en: If I were to live abroad, I would live in Britain.
If you want a pencil, I'll lend you one.
tr: Kalem istersen, sana bir tane ödünç veririm.

en: Please drop it in the mail if it's not out of your way.
If that's false, she's a liar.
If it rains, take the washing in.
If it rains, the excursion will be called off.
If it's raining, we don't plan to go hiking.
tr: Yağmur yağıyorsa, doğa yürüyüşü yapmayı planlamıyoruz.

en: I will put off my departure if it rains.
Suppose it rains, what shall we do?
tr: Diyelim ki yağmur yağdı, ne yapacağız?

en: What would you do if you saw a man from another planet?
tr: Başka bir gezegenden bir adam görsen, ne yapardın?
